markdown:
| icon           = poe2 necklace_bone_setters_torc icon.png
| description    = In the early days of Vailian sea exploration, innumerable dangers threatened any ship setting out for uncharted waters. Far from proper medical aid, even minor injuries or illnesses could render a ship's crew ineffective, ending expeditions before they were complete. Such ventures were often funded by Vailian interests and represented considerable capital. Thus the admiralty commissioned the services of Gregori Felizze me Fontina, a renowned physician.

Working with enchanters and artificers, Fontina developed a method by which to transfer basic medical knowledge into affordably-made torcs which could be easily manufactured, shipped, and stored. These trinkets were widely distributed to ships' quartermasters and surgeons, allowing them to treat their crews more effectively. Following the amulets' introduction, the admiralty noted a slight but undeniable increase in the survival rate of their crews, and thus the success rate of their expeditions.
| added_in       = poe2
| equipment_slot = Neck
| item_type      = Amulet
| item_category  = Accessory
| requirements   = 
| is_soulbound   = no
| is_unique      = yes
| value          = 410
| shop_value     = 2050
| total_uses     = 3

| guid           = 4871decb-3312-4d46-8cf4-5e15e452d6ef
}}
